quote: He could never be anything more than what he was: the inheritor of weakness and unbridled emotion, a creature possessed by the past, and carrying its curse forever into the future--
quote_letters: HE COULD NEVER BE ANYTHING MORE THAN WHAT HE WAS THE INHERITOR OF WEAKNESS AND UNBRIDLED EMOTION A CREATURE POSSESSED BY THE PAST AND CARRYING ITS CURSE FOREVER INTO THE FUTURE--
